title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 39.3 - Radio-telephone utilities and resellers of telephone services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 39.3 - Radio-telephone utilities and resellers of telephone services

State Regulations

Applications pursuant to section
100
of the

Public Service Law by radio-telephone utilities and resellers of telephone
services shall contain: (a) a
description of the securities to be purchased or acquired; (b) the reasons in detail why the applicant
desires to make the purchase or acquisition; and
(c) the amount of such stock or bonds already
owned by the applicant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
39.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
